home.welcomeSubtitle: Fostering children's expressive power through reading aloud.
ocr.ocrScreenSubtitle: Take a picture of a book page to extract text.
ocr.selectImagePrompt: Tap to take a picture of a book or select from your gallery.
ocr.imageSelected: Image selected. You can now start OCR.
ocr.sampleOcrText:
This is sample text.
The text extracted from the image will appear here.
ocr.ocrError: Oops, text extraction failed. Please try again!
